subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chicago overcame another shaky performance by Carlos Marmol to win, 2-1, at home over Florida on Friday, snapping the Marlins’ season-high six-game winning streak.
snippet: Chicago overcame another shaky performance by Carlos Marmol to win, 2-1, at home over Florida on Friday, snapping the Marlins’ season-high six-game winning streak.
